alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:43PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Berkshire and northeastern Columbia Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 543 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Housatonic, or near Great Barrington, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, Lee, Lenox, Cheshire, New Lebanon, Austerlitz, Hancock, New Ashford, Housatonic, Berkshire, Dalton, Lanesborough, Hinsdale, Stockbridge, Canaan, Richmond, West Stockbridge, Windsor, Peru and Alford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
